original: 'byung ba rnams kyi de rnams gcig /'byung ba las gyur pa'i gzugs 'byung ba rnams kyi ni rnam par smin pa'i rgyu kho na yin te /
analyzed: 'byung ba rnams kyi de rnams gcig /'byung ba las gyur pa'i gzugs 'byung ba rnams kyi ni rnam par smin pa'i rgyu kho na yin te /
translated: The form derived from the elements is the cause of karmic maturation of the elements.

original: lus dang ngag gi las gang gis 'byung ba rnams rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: lus dang ngag gi las gang gis 'byung ba rnams rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The elements are the cause of karmic maturation of the body and speech karma that projects them.

original: sems dang sems las byung ba rnams bye brag med par mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen du bshad kyi sems gang gi mjug thogs su gang 'byung ba ma bshad pas de brjod pa /
analyzed: sems dang sems las byung ba rnams bye brag med par mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen du bshad kyi sems gang gi mjug thogs su gang 'byung ba ma bshad pas de brjod pa /
translated: The minds and mental factors are explained as the similar and immediately preceding condition without differentiation. But since it is not explained which mind arises after which mind, that will now be explained.

original: mdor bsdu na sems bcu gnyis po 'di lta ste /
analyzed: mdor bsdu na sems bcu gnyis po 'di lta ste /
translated: In brief, there are twelve minds:üîΩThe mind of desire realm virtuous, nonvirtuous,

original: 'dod yid dge dang mi dge dang // bsgribs pa dang ni ma bsgribs pa //
analyzed: 'dod yid dge dang mi dge dang // bsgribs pa dang ni ma bsgribs pa //
translated: obscured and unobscured.

original: 'dod pa'i khams na sems bzhi ste //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams na sems bzhi ste //
translated: There are four minds in the desire realm:

original: dge ba dang mi dge ba dang / bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang / ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba dang mi dge ba dang / bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang / ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'o //
translated: virtuous, nonvirtuous, obscured neutral and unobscured neutral.

original: gzugs dang gzugs med pa dag na //
analyzed: gzugs dang gzugs med pa dag na //
translated: In the form and formless realms,

original: mi dge las gzhan /
analyzed: mi dge las gzhan /
translated: except for nonvirtue.

original: bcu po de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems yin no //
analyzed: bcu po de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems yin no //
translated: These ten are defiled minds.

original: zag med gnyis /
analyzed: zag med gnyis /
translated: Two are pure.

original: slob pa dang mi slob pa ste /üîΩde ltar na de dag ni @123a * //
analyzed: slob pa dang mi slob pa ste / de ltar na de dag ni @123a * //
translated: The pure mind is the learner's mind and the nonlearner's mind.

original: sems bcu gnyis yin no //
analyzed: sems bcu gnyis yin no //
translated: Thus there are twelve minds.

original: de la / 'dod sems dge ba las sems dgu //
analyzed: de la / 'dod sems dge ba las sems dgu //
translated: From a virtuous mind of the desire realm, nine minds.

original: mjug thogs su zhes 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ro //üîΩ'di lta ste /
analyzed: mjug thogs su zhes 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ro // 'di lta ste /
translated: The phrase immediately after is explained below.üîΩThe following minds arise immediately after a virtuous mind of the desire realm.

original: rang gi sa pa bzhi dang / gzugs na spyod pa gnyis dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe dge ba dang / nying mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe bsgribs pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi sa pa bzhi dang / gzugs na spyod pa gnyis dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe dge ba dang / nying mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe bsgribs pa'o //
translated: Four of its own level, two of the form realm, and the virtuous mind of meditative attainment and the obscured mind of linking.

original: gzugs med pa na spyod pa ni bsgribs pa kho na'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa na spyod pa ni bsgribs pa kho na'o //
translated: The obscured mind of the formless realm arises from it.

original: slob pa dang mi slob pa zhes so //
analyzed: slob pa dang mi slob pa zhes so //
translated: The learner's mind and the nonlearner's mind arise from it.

original: de ni brgyad po kho na las /
analyzed: de ni brgyad po kho na las /
translated: It arises from eight minds.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i dge ba'i sems de yang ni brgyad kyi mjug thogs su 'byung ste /
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i dge ba'i sems de yang ni brgyad kyi mjug thogs su 'byung ste /
translated: A virtuous mind of the desire realm arises immediately after eight minds.

original: rang gi sa pa bzhi dang / gzugs na spyod pa gnyis las te /
analyzed: rang gi sa pa bzhi dang / gzugs na spyod pa gnyis las te /
translated: Four of its own level, two of the form realm, and the virtuous mind of meditative attainment and the unobscured mind of birth in the form realm.

original: ldang ba'i tshe dge ba dang / nyon mongs pa can gyi snyoms par 'jug pas gzir ba'i tshe sa 'og ma'i dge ba la brten pa'i phyir bsgribs pa dang / ldang ba'i tshe slob pa dang mi slob pa dag las so //
analyzed: ldang ba'i tshe dge ba dang / nyon mongs pa can gyi snyoms par 'jug pas gzir ba'i tshe sa 'og ma'i dge ba la brten pa'i phyir bsgribs pa dang / ldang ba'i tshe slob pa dang mi slob pa dag las so //
translated: When one arises from the attainment of the realm of desire, when one is oppressed by the attainment of the realm of desire, when one is oppressed by the attainment of the realm of fine-materiality, when one is oppressed by the attainment of the realm of immateriality, when one is oppressed by the wholesome attainment, when one is oppressed by the defiled attainment, when one is oppressed by the wholesome attainment of a lower stage, then the wholesome thought of the realm of desire arises.

original: mi dge ba ni bcu dag las //
analyzed: mi dge ba ni bcu dag las //
translated: The unwholesome thought can arise immediately after ten thoughts.üîΩThe unwholesome thought of the realm of desire can arise immediately after ten thoughts, namely:üîΩfour thoughts of the same stage,üîΩexcept for the thought acquired at birth;üîΩtwo thoughts of the realm of fine-materiality, the wholesome thought and the obscured-non-defined thought;üîΩtwo thoughts of the realm of immateriality, the wholesome thought and the obscured-non-defined thought;

original: slob pa dang mi slob pa ma gtogs pa'o //
analyzed: slob pa dang mi slob pa ma gtogs pa'o //
translated: the unobscured-non-defined thought of the realm of fine-materiality.

original: de las bzhi ste /
analyzed: de las bzhi ste /
translated: The obscured-non-defined thought can arise immediately after four thoughts, namely:

original: rang gi sa pa dag kho na'o //
analyzed: rang gi sa pa dag kho na'o //
translated: the two thoughts of its own stage,

original: ji ltar 'dod pa'i khams kyi mi dge ba'i sems kyi bshad pa /üîΩbsgribs de bzhin /üîΩmi dge ba ji lta ba bzhin no //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dod pa'i khams kyi mi dge ba'i sems kyi bshad pa / bsgribs de bzhin / mi dge ba ji lta ba bzhin no //
translated: the wholesome thought and the unobscured-non-defined thought of the realm of fine-materiality.

original: ma bsgribs pa ni lnga dag las //üîΩma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i sems ni lnga las te /
analyzed: ma bsgribs pa ni lnga dag las // ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i sems ni lnga las te /
translated: The unobscured-non-defined thought can arise immediately after five thoughts,üîΩnamely:üîΩthe four thoughts of its own stage;

original: rang gi sa pa bzhi dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba las sprul pa'i sems so //
analyzed: rang gi sa pa bzhi dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba las sprul pa'i sems so //
translated: the wholesome thought of the realm of fine-materiality, when one enters into meditative attainment of the first meditation.

original: de las mjug thogs sems bdun no //
analyzed: de las mjug thogs sems bdun no //
translated: Seven thoughts can arise immediately after the unobscured-non-defined thought.üîΩFour thoughts of its own stage,

original: rang gi bzhi dang / gzugs na spyod pa gnyis te /
analyzed: rang gi bzhi dang / gzugs na spyod pa gnyis te /
translated: two thoughts of the realm of fine-materiality,

original: sprul pa'i sems kyi mjug thogs su dge ba dang / nying mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe nyon mongs pa can dang / de bzhin du gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can no //
analyzed: sprul pa'i sems kyi mjug thogs su dge ba dang / nying mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe nyon mongs pa can dang / de bzhin du gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can no //
translated: Immediately after the mind capable of creating fictive beings, there arises a wholesome thought of the same stage.

original: gzugs na dge las bcu gcig go //
analyzed: gzugs na dge las bcu gcig go //
translated: Immediately after the wholesome thought, eleven thoughts can arise.üîΩImmediately after the wholesome thought, eleven thoughts can arise: six thoughts of the same stage, except for the effect of superknowledge;

original: gzugs med pa na spyod pa ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa ma gtogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa na spyod pa ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa ma gtogs pa'o //
translated: two thoughts of the realm of desire, the unwholesome thought and the obscured-non-defined thought;üîΩtwo thoughts of the realm of fine-materiality, the wholesome thought and the obscured-non-defined thought.

original: de ni dgu yi mjug thogs su //
analyzed: de ni dgu yi mjug thogs su //
translated: Immediately after the obscured-non-defined thought, nine thoughts can arise.üîΩtwo thoughts of the realm of desire, the unwholesome thought and the obscured-non-defined thought;

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can gnyis dang / gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa ma gtogs so //üîΩbsgribs pa brgyad las /
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can gnyis dang / gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa ma gtogs so // bsgribs pa brgyad las /
translated: two thoughts of the realm of fine-materiality, the wholesome thought and the obscured-non-defined thought;üîΩtwo thoughts of the realm of immateriality, the wholesome thought and the obscured-non-defined thought;

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can gnyis dang / slob pa dang / mi slob pa gnyis ma gtogs so //
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can gnyis dang / slob pa dang / mi slob pa gnyis ma gtogs so //
translated: the unobscured-non-defined thought of the realm of fine-materiality.üîΩImmediately after the obscured-non-defined thought, six thoughts can arise:üîΩthree thoughts of the same stage, except for the unobscured-non-defined thought;

original: de las drug @123b bsgribs pa las rang gi sa pa gsum dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa ma gtogs so //
analyzed: de las drug @123b bsgribs pa las rang gi sa pa gsum dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa ma gtogs so //
translated: the unwholesome thought and the obscured-non-defined thought of the realm of desire.

original: ma bsgribs pa ni gsum las so //
analyzed: ma bsgribs pa ni gsum las so //
translated: The unobscured mind can arise after three minds.

original: ma bsgribs pa ni rang gi sa pa dag kho na las so //
analyzed: ma bsgribs pa ni rang gi sa pa dag kho na las so //
translated: The unobscured mind can arise after the three minds of its level.

original: de las drug ste /
analyzed: de las drug ste /
translated: Six minds can arise after the unobscured mind.

original: rang gi sa pa gsum dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dag dang / gzugs med pa na spyod pa yang ngo //üîΩgzugs kyi khams kyi ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa ji skad bshad pa ltar /
analyzed: rang gi sa pa gsum dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dag dang / gzugs med pa na spyod pa yang ngo // gzugs kyi khams kyi ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa ji skad bshad pa ltar /
translated: Three minds of its level, two defiled minds of the realm of desire, and a defiled mind of the realm of immateriality.üîΩAs the unobscured-non-defined mind of the realm of fine-materiality is explained,

original: gzugs med pa'ang de'i tshul lo //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'ang de'i tshul lo //
translated: so is the unobscured-non-defined mind of the realm of immateriality.

original: de na yod pa'i yang rang gi sa pa gsum kho na las 'byung la /
analyzed: de na yod pa'i yang rang gi sa pa gsum kho na las 'byung la /
translated: The unobscured-non-defined mind of the realm of immateriality can arise after three minds of its level.

original: de las kyang rang gi sa pa gsum po dang sa 'og ma pa'i nyon mongs pa can rnams dang drug 'byung ngo //üîΩdge ba las sems dgu dag go //
analyzed: de las kyang rang gi sa pa gsum po dang sa 'og ma pa'i nyon mongs pa can rnams dang drug 'byung ngo // dge ba las sems dgu dag go //
translated: Six minds can arise after this unobscured-non-defined mind: three minds of its level, two defiled minds of the realm of desire, and a defiled mind of the realm of fine-materiality.üîΩNine minds can arise after a wholesome mind.

original: gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i dge ba'i sems las ni sems dgu 'byung ste /
analyzed: gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i dge ba'i sems las ni sems dgu 'byung ste /
translated: Nine minds can arise after a wholesome mind of the realm of immateriality.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i dge ba dang / 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag ma gtogs so //
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i dge ba dang / 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag ma gtogs so //
translated: with the exception of the wholesome of the realm of desire and of the non-defined of the realm of desire and of the realm of fine-materiality.

original: de drug go //
analyzed: de drug go //
translated: These six thoughts can arise after the obscured-non-defined thought of the realm of desire.

original: rang gi sa pa gsum dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa dag las so //
analyzed: rang gi sa pa gsum dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa dag las so //
translated: Three thoughts of the same stage, plus the wholesome thought of the realm of fine-materiality, plus the thought of those in training and the thought of those beyond training.

original: bsgribs pa la bdun /üîΩrang gi sa pa gsum dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba dang / bsgribs pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can gnyis so //
analyzed: bsgribs pa la bdun / rang gi sa pa gsum dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba dang / bsgribs pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can gnyis so //
translated: Seven thoughts can arise after the obscured-non-defined thought of the realm of fine-materiality.üîΩThree thoughts of the same stage, plus the wholesome thought and the obscured-non-defined thought of the realm of desire, plus the obscured-non-defined thought of the realm of finemateriality.

original: de de bzhin /
analyzed: de de bzhin /
translated: The same for the obscured-non-defined thought of the realm of finemateriality.

original: de yang bdun kho na las 'byung ste /
analyzed: de yang bdun kho na las 'byung ste /
translated: Seven thoughts can arise after the obscured-non-defined thought of the realm of finemateriality.

original: 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can rnams dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa dag ma gtogs so //
analyzed: 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can rnams dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa dag ma gtogs so //
translated: With the exception of the defiled thoughts of the realm of desire and of the realm of fine-materiality, plus the thought of those in training and the thought of those beyond training.

original: slob pa bzhi las /
analyzed: slob pa bzhi las /
translated: Four thoughts can arise after the thought of those in training.

original: khams gsum pa'i dge ba dang slob pa las so //
analyzed: khams gsum pa'i dge ba dang slob pa las so //
translated: The wholesome thought of the three realms and the thought of those in training.

original: de las lnga /
analyzed: de las lnga /
translated: Five thoughts can arise after the thought of those in training.

original: bzhi po de dag nyid dang / mi slob pa'o //
analyzed: bzhi po de dag nyid dang / mi slob pa'o //
translated: The four thoughts just mentioned and the thought of those beyond training.

original: mi slob pa ni lnga las so //
analyzed: mi slob pa ni lnga las so //
translated: The thought of those beyond training can arise after five thoughts.

original: bshad ma thag pa'i lnga po de nyid las so //
analyzed: bshad ma thag pa'i lnga po de nyid las so //
translated: These are the five just mentioned.üîΩFrom these, four minds.

original: de las sems ni bzhi dag go //
analyzed: de las sems ni bzhi dag go //
translated: Four minds arise from these five minds.üîΩTwo arise from a wholesome mind of the realm of desire:

original: khams gsum pa'i dge ba dag dang / mi slob pa'o //
analyzed: khams gsum pa'i dge ba dag dang / mi slob pa'o //
translated: a wholesome mind obtained from birth and a wholesome mind acquired through preparatory effort.

original: sems bcu gnyis rdzogs so /
analyzed: sems bcu gnyis rdzogs so /
translated: Two arise from a wholesome mind of the realm of fine-materiality:üîΩa wholesome mind obtained from birth and a wholesome mind acquired through preparatory effort.

original: // / yang bcu gnyis de dag nyi shur yang //
analyzed: // / yang bcu gnyis de dag nyi shur yang //
translated: Two arise from a wholesome mind of the realm of immateriality:üîΩa wholesome mind acquired through preparatory effort and a mind acquired at birth.

original: bshad de / gsum du skyes nas thob pa dang // sbyor byung dge rnam gnyis phye nas //
analyzed: bshad de / gsum du skyes nas thob pa dang // sbyor byung dge rnam gnyis phye nas //
translated: Two arise from a defiled mind of the realm of desire:üîΩa defiled-neutral mind of the realm of desire and a defiled-neutral mind of the realm of fine-materiality.üîΩTwo arise from a defiled mind of the realm of fine-materiality:üîΩa defiled-neutral mind of the realm of fine-materiality and a defiled-neutral mind of the realm of desire.üîΩTwo arise from a defiled mind of the realm of immateriality:üîΩa defiled-neutral mind of the realm of immateriality and a defiled-neutral mind of the realm of fine-materiality.

original: khams gsum po dag tu skyes nas thob pa dang / sbyor ba las byung ba'i dge ba'i sems rnam pa gnyis su dbye'o //
analyzed: khams gsum po dag tu skyes nas thob pa dang / sbyor ba las byung ba'i dge ba'i sems rnam pa gnyis su dbye'o //
translated: Two arise from a defiled-neutral mind of the realm of desire:

original: rnam smin skyes dang sbyor lam pa //
analyzed: rnam smin skyes dang sbyor lam pa //
translated: a defiled-neutral mind of the realm of desire and a defiled-neutral mind of the realm of fine-materiality.

original: bzo yi gnas @124a * //
analyzed: bzo yi gnas @124a * //
translated: Two arise from a defiled-neutral mind of the realm of fine-materiality:

original: dang sprul pa dang // 'dod na lung bstan min rnams bzhi //üîΩgzugs na bzo ma gtogs pa'o //
analyzed: dang sprul pa dang // 'dod na lung bstan min rnams bzhi // gzugs na bzo ma gtogs pa'o //
translated: a defiled-neutral mind of the realm of fine-materiality and a defiled-neutral mind of the realm of desire.üîΩTwo arise from a defiled-neutral mind of the realm of immateriality:üîΩa defiled-neutral mind of the realm of immateriality and a defiled-neutral mind of the realm of fine-materiality.üîΩTwo arise from a defiled-neutral mind of the realm of immateriality:

original: gzugs kyi khams na bzo'i gnas ma gtogs te /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams na bzo'i gnas ma gtogs te /
translated: a defiled-neutral mind of the realm of immateriality and a defiled-neutral mind of the realm of fine-materiality.

original: de na bzo med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de na bzo med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Two arise from a defiled-neutral mind of the realm of immateriality:üîΩa defiled-neutral mind of the realm of immateriality and a defiled-neutral mind of the realm of fine-materiality.üîΩTwo arise from a defiled-neutral mind of the realm of immateriality:

original: de ltar bcu gnyis po de dag nyi shur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar bcu gnyis po de dag nyi shur 'gyur ro //
translated: a defiled-neutral mind of the realm of immateriality and a defiled-neutral mind of the

original: yang sems nyi shu po 'di dag las gang gi mjug thogs su gang zhig 'byung ba de brjod de /
analyzed: yang sems nyi shu po 'di dag las gang gi mjug thogs su gang zhig 'byung ba de brjod de /
translated: What arises immediately after what?

original: 'dod na sbyor ba'i sems las bcu //
analyzed: 'dod na sbyor ba'i sems las bcu //
translated: Ten arise immediately after the desire realm mind of preparation.üîΩSeven of its own level arise immediately after the desire realm mind of preparation, except for the mind obtained from preparation of higher perception.

original: mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa rang gi sa pa bdun dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa rang gi sa pa bdun dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa'o //
translated: The form realm mind of preparation and uncontaminated minds arise from it.üîΩEight arise immediately after the uncontaminated mind.üîΩThe desire realm mind of preparation and the afflicted minds of its own level arise immediately after the uncontaminated mind.

original: de yang brgyad kyi mjug thogs su rang gi dge ba dang / nyon mongs pa can dag dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang / nyon mongs pa can dag dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa dag las so //
analyzed: de yang brgyad kyi mjug thogs su rang gi dge ba dang / nyon mongs pa can dag dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang / nyon mongs pa can dag dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa dag las so //
translated: The form realm mind of preparation and the afflicted minds of its own level arise immediately after the form realm mind of preparation.

original: skyes nas thog pa'i mjug thogs su dgu /
analyzed: skyes nas thog pa'i mjug thogs su dgu /
translated: Nine arise immediately after the mind obtained from birth.üîΩSeven of its own level arise immediately after the desire realm mind obtained from birth, except for the mind obtained from preparation of higher perception.

original: mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa rang gi sa pa bdun dang / gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dag go //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa rang gi sa pa bdun dang / gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dag go //
translated: The afflicted minds of the form and formless realms arise from it.

original: de yang bcu gcig mjug thogs su //
analyzed: de yang bcu gcig mjug thogs su //
translated: Eleven arise immediately after it.

original: bcu gcig gi mjug thogs su 'byung zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bcu gcig gi mjug thogs su 'byung zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: after the eleventh.

original: snga ma bzhin du rang gi sa pa bdun dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang // nyon mongs pa can dag dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa dag las so //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du rang gi sa pa bdun dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang // nyon mongs pa can dag dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa dag las so //
translated: As above, seven of its own stage, and the obscured-neutral of the realm of fine-materiality, and the two pure thought, i.e., the thought acquired through preparatory effort and the thought acquired at birth.

original: nyon mongs can sems gnyis las bdun //
analyzed: nyon mongs can sems gnyis las bdun //
translated: From two defiled thoughts, seven.

original: snga bzhin rang gi dag kho na'o //
analyzed: snga bzhin rang gi dag kho na'o //
translated: As above, of its own stage.

original: de dag bcu bzhi'i sems mjug thogs //
analyzed: de dag bcu bzhi'i sems mjug thogs //
translated: These fourteen thoughts immediately follow after seven thoughts.

original: rang gi sa pa bdun dang / sbyor ba las byung ba dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa gzugs na spyod pa bzhi dang ; sbyor ba las byung ba ma gtogs pa gzugs med pa na spyod pa gsum las so //
analyzed: rang gi sa pa bdun dang / sbyor ba las byung ba dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa gzugs na spyod pa bzhi dang ; sbyor ba las byung ba ma gtogs pa gzugs med pa na spyod pa gsum las so //
translated: Seven of its own stage, four of the realm of fine-materiality, i.e., the thought acquired through preparatory effort and the thought acquired at birth, with the exception of the thought associated with proper deportment and the thought resulting from retribution, and three of the realm of immateriality, i.e., the thought acquired through preparatory effort and the thought acquired at birth, with the exception of the thought acquired through the power of the cause.

original: spyod lam rnam smin skyes phyis brgyad //
analyzed: spyod lam rnam smin skyes phyis brgyad //
translated: Eight later, of the realm of desire, of the realm of fine-materiality, of the realm of immateriality.

original: sbyor ba las byung ba dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs pa rang gi sa pa drug dang / gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dag go //
analyzed: sbyor ba las byung ba dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs pa rang gi sa pa drug dang / gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dag go //
translated: six thoughts of its level, except for the effect of superknowledge and the effect of action, and two thoughts of the realm of fine-materiality and of the realm of immateriality, which are defiled.

original: de dag bdun po nyid las so //
analyzed: de dag bdun po nyid las so //
translated: These seven thoughts can arise immediately after the thought of emanation.

original: sngar bzhin du rang gi sa pa bdun kho na las so //
analyzed: sngar bzhin du rang gi sa pa bdun kho na las so //
translated: Immediately after the thought of emanation, seven thoughts can arise, namely:üîΩsix thoughts of the same stage, except for the effect of superknowledge and the effect of action.

original: bzo'i gnas las drug / sbyor ba las byung ba dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs pa rang gi rnams kho na'o //
analyzed: bzo'i gnas las drug / sbyor ba las byung ba dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs pa rang gi rnams kho na'o //
translated: These seven thoughts can arise immediately after the thought of emanation.

original: de yang / bdun las /
analyzed: de yang / bdun las /
translated: Immediately after the thought of emanation, seven thoughts can arise, namely:üîΩtwo thoughts of the realm of fine-materiality, the effect of superknowledge and the effect of action being excluded.üîΩThe thought of emanation arises immediately after two thoughts.

original: mngon par shes pa'i 'bras @124b bu ma gtogs pa rang gi dag kho na las so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa'i 'bras @124b bu ma gtogs pa rang gi dag kho na las so //
translated: The thought of emanation arises immediately after the two thoughts of the realm of fine-materiality, the effect of superknowledge and the effect of action being excluded.

original: sprul sems phyi nas gnyis /
analyzed: sprul sems phyi nas gnyis /
translated: The thought of emanation arises immediately after two thoughts.

original: mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu rang nyid dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu rang nyid dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba'o //
translated: The thought of emanation arises immediately after the two thoughts of the realm of fine-materiality, the effect of superknowledge and the effect of action being excluded.

original: de yang gnyis las byung /üîΩde kho na las so //
analyzed: de yang gnyis las byung / de kho na las so //
translated: The thought of emanation arises immediately after two thoughts.üîΩThe thought of emanation arises immediately after the two thoughts of the realm of fine-materiality, the effect of superknowledge and the effect of action being excluded.

original: 'dod pa las skyes pa /üîΩbrgyad po dag go //
analyzed: 'dod pa las skyes pa / brgyad po dag go //
translated: The thought of emanation arises immediately after two thoughts.üîΩThe thought of emanation arises immediately after the two thoughts of the realm of fine-materiality, the effect of superknowledge and the effect of action being excluded.

original: gzugs gtogs brjod ;
analyzed: gzugs gtogs brjod ;
translated: The thought of emanation arises immediately after two thoughts.üîΩThe thought of emanation arises immediately after the two thoughts of the realm of fine-materiality, the effect of superknowledge and the effect of action being excluded.

original: sbyor ba las byung las bcu gnyis //
analyzed: sbyor ba las byung las bcu gnyis //
translated: Twelve arise from the realm of form.üîΩTwelve arise from the realm of desire: the wholesome, the two unwholesome, the two of karmic maturation, the two of deportment, the two of craftsmanship, the fruit of the superknowledges, and the two unobscured-non-virtuous minds of the realm of desire.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i dge ba dag dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu dang / rang gi drug dang / gzugs med pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang / slob pa dang / mi slob pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i dge ba dag dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu dang / rang gi drug dang / gzugs med pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang / slob pa dang / mi slob pa'o //
translated: The wholesome of the realm of form, the two of karmic maturation and the two of craftsmanship, the unobscured-non-virtuous mind of the realm of desire, and the unobscured-non-virtuous mind of the formless realm.

original: de yang sems bcu'i mjug thogs su /
analyzed: de yang sems bcu'i mjug thogs su /
translated: The wholesome of the realm of desire arises from ten minds.üîΩThe wholesome of the realm of desire arises from four minds: the two of the realm of desire, the wholesome of the realm of form that arises from preparation and the uncontaminated mind.üîΩThe unwholesome of the realm of desire arises from the two unwholesome minds of the realm of desire and the unobscured-non-virtuous minds of the two higher realms.üîΩThe obscured of the realm of desire arises from the two obscured minds of the realm of desire and the obscured minds of the two higher realms.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu dag dang / spyod lam pa dang / rnam par smin pa la skyes pa dag ma gtogs pa rang gi bzhi dang / gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang /
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu dag dang / spyod lam pa dang / rnam par smin pa la skyes pa dag ma gtogs pa rang gi bzhi dang / gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang /
translated: The unobscured-non-virtuous mind of the realm of desire arises from the two unobscured-non-virtuous minds of the realm of desire and the two higher realms.üîΩThe unobscured-non-virtuous mind of the formless realm arises from the two unobscured-non-virtuous minds of the formless realm and the unobscured-non-virtuous mind of the realm of desire.üîΩThe uncontaminated mind arises from the uncontaminated mind itself.

original: nyon mongs pa can dag dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa dag las so //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can dag dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa dag las so //
translated: The uncontaminated mind arises from the uncontaminated mind itself.

original: skyes nas thob pa'i mjug thogs brgyad //
analyzed: skyes nas thob pa'i mjug thogs brgyad //
translated: The wholesome of the realm of form arises from eight minds.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dag dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa rang gi lnga dang / gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can no //
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dag dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa rang gi lnga dang / gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can no //
translated: It is the effect of the wholesome and defiled of the realm of desire, of five of the realms of finemateriality, with the exception of the effect of superknowledge.

original: de ni lnga las /
analyzed: de ni lnga las /
translated: It is the effect of five.

original: mjug thogs su mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa rang gi dag kho na las so //
analyzed: mjug thogs su mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa rang gi dag kho na las so //
translated: It is the effect of the five of the same stage, with the exception of the effect of superknowledge.

original: bsgribs las dgu /üîΩ'dod pa na spyod pa'i dge ba dang / nyon mongs pa can dag ste /
analyzed: bsgribs las dgu / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i dge ba dang / nyon mongs pa can dag ste /
translated: It is the effect of nine.

original: bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa rang gi lnga'o //
analyzed: bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa rang gi lnga'o //
translated: It is the effect of the wholesome and defiled of the realm of desire, of four of the realm of finemateriality, with the exception of the effect of superknowledge, and of the defiled of the realm of immateriality.

original: de yang sems ni bcu gcig las /
analyzed: de yang sems ni bcu gcig las /
translated: It is the effect of eleven thoughts.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i skyes nas thob pa dang / spyod lam pa dang / rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dag dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa rang gi lnga dang / sbyor ba las byung ba ma gtogs pa gzugs med pa na spyod pa gsum las so //
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i skyes nas thob pa dang / spyod lam pa dang / rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dag dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa rang gi lnga dang / sbyor ba las byung ba ma gtogs pa gzugs med pa na spyod pa gsum las so //
translated: It is the effect of the wholesome and defiled of the realm of desire, of five of the realm of finemateriality, with the exception of the effect of superknowledge, and of three of the realm of immateriality, with the exception of that which arises from the ripening cause and of that which is of the unhindered path.

original: rnam smin skyes dang spyod lam las ;
analyzed: rnam smin skyes dang spyod lam las ;
translated: Seven arise from the mind of emanation.

original: / bdun no //
analyzed: / bdun no //
translated: Seven minds arise from the mind of emanation.üîΩThe six are the six desire realm virtuous minds derived from preparation and the uncontaminated mind.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dag dang / sbyor ba las byung ba dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa rang gi gzhi dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can no //
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dag dang / sbyor ba las byung ba dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa rang gi gzhi dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can no //
translated: The seventh is the form realm mind derived from preparation.

original: de dag lnga nyid las /üîΩmngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa @125a * //üîΩrang gi dag kho na las so //
analyzed: de dag lnga nyid las / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pa @125a * // rang gi dag kho na las so //
translated: The mind of emanation arises from five minds.üîΩThe mind of emanation arises from five minds: the three minds of emanation of the three realms, the desire realm virtuous mind derived from preparation and the uncontaminated mind.

original: sprul sems las gnyis /üîΩrang gi sbyor ba las byung ba dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu dag kho na'o //üîΩde gnyis las /
analyzed: sprul sems las gnyis / rang gi sbyor ba las byung ba dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu dag kho na'o // de gnyis las /
translated: The mind of emanation arises from two minds.

original: de kho na las so //
analyzed: de kho na las so //
translated: The mind of emanation arises from two minds: the two minds of emanation of the two higher realms.

original: gzugs su gtogs pa bshad nas /
analyzed: gzugs su gtogs pa bshad nas /
translated: The form realm mind derived from preparation arises from seven minds.üîΩThe form realm mind derived from preparation arises from seven minds: the two desire realm minds derived from preparation, the two uncontaminated minds, the form realm mind derived from preparation and the two formless realm minds derived from preparation.

original: gzugs med par gtogs par brjod do /
analyzed: gzugs med par gtogs par brjod do /
translated: The formless realm mind derived from preparation arises from seven minds.üîΩThe formless realm mind derived from preparation arises from seven minds: the two desire realm minds derived from preparation, the two uncontaminated minds, the form realm mind derived from preparation and the formless realm mind derived from preparation.

original: gzugs med gtogs pa'i mjug thogs su //
analyzed: gzugs med gtogs pa'i mjug thogs su //
translated: The formless realm mind derived from preparation arises from seven minds.üîΩThe formless realm mind derived from preparation arises from seven minds: the two desire realm minds derived from preparation, the two uncontaminated minds, the form realm mind derived from preparation and the formless realm mind derived from preparation.

original: sbyor ba las byung sems bdun no //üîΩgzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang / rang gi bzhi dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba las byung sems bdun no //üîΩgzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang / rang gi bzhi dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa'o //
translated: The formless realm mind derived from preparation arises from seven minds.

original: de drug las gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang / rnam par smin pa las skyes pa ma gtogs pa rang gi gsum dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa dag las so //
analyzed: de drug las gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang / rnam par smin pa las skyes pa ma gtogs pa rang gi gsum dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa dag las so //
translated: Among these six, the wholesome of the realm of fine-materiality arises immediately after three thoughts of the same stage, excluding the thought acquired through preparatory effort and the thought acquired through the ripening cause, and also after the thought of those beyond training and the thought of those in training.

original: skyes nas thob pa'i /
analyzed: skyes nas thob pa'i /
translated: The wholesome thought acquired at birth

original: mjug thogs su ni sems bdun te //
analyzed: mjug thogs su ni sems bdun te //
translated: immediately after seven thoughts.

original: rang gi bzhi dang / sa 'og ma'i nyon mongs pa can dag go //
analyzed: rang gi bzhi dang / sa 'og ma'i nyon mongs pa can dag go //
translated: It arises immediately after four thoughts of its own stage, and after the two defiled thoughts of the stage of the realm of desire.

original: de yang bzhi las /
analyzed: de yang bzhi las /
translated: And this thought arises immediately after four thoughts.

original: rang gi dag kho na las so //
analyzed: rang gi dag kho na las so //
translated: It arises immediately after the four thoughts of its own stage.

original: bsgribs las brgyad /
analyzed: bsgribs las brgyad /
translated: The obscured thought arises immediately after eight thoughts.

original: rang gi bzhi dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang / nyon mongs pa can dag dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dag go //
analyzed: rang gi bzhi dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba dang / nyon mongs pa can dag dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dag go //
translated: It arises immediately after four thoughts of its own stage, and after the thought acquired through preparatory effort and the defiled thought of the realm of fine-materiality, and after the two defiled thoughts of the realm of desire.

original: de yang bcu yi mjug thogs su //
analyzed: de yang bcu yi mjug thogs su //
translated: And this thought arises immediately after ten thoughts.

original: rang gi bzhi dang / 'dod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i skyes nas thob pa dang / spyod lam pa dang / rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dag las so //
analyzed: rang gi bzhi dang / 'dod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i skyes nas thob pa dang / spyod lam pa dang / rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dag las so //
translated: It arises immediately after the four thoughts of its own stage, and after the thought acquired at birth, the thought associated with proper deportment and the thought acquired through the ripening cause of the realm of desire and the realm of fine-materiality.

original: rnam smin skyes las drug / sbyor ba las byung ba ma gtogs pa rang gi gsum dang / 'og ma'i nyon mongs pa can gsum mo //
analyzed: rnam smin skyes las drug / sbyor ba las byung ba ma gtogs pa rang gi gsum dang / 'og ma'i nyon mongs pa can gsum mo //
translated: Except for the one arisen from application, three of its own level and the three afflicted ones of the lower level arise.üîΩFour arise from the pure.

original: bzhi las / de yang rang gi dag kho na las so //
analyzed: bzhi las / de yang rang gi dag kho na las so //
translated: They arise from the pure itself.üîΩSix arise from the learner.

original: slob pa'i mjug thogs drug / khams gsum pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba rnams dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i skyes nas thob pa dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa'o //
analyzed: slob pa'i mjug thogs drug / khams gsum pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba rnams dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i skyes nas thob pa dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa'o //
translated: Three arisen from application of the three realms, the one obtained from birth of the desire realm, and the learner and nonlearner minds arise from the learner mind.

original: de yang bzhi las /
analyzed: de yang bzhi las /
translated: Four arise from that.

original: sbyor ba las byung ba gsum dang / slob pa las so //
analyzed: sbyor ba las byung ba gsum dang / slob pa las so //
translated: Three arisen from application and the learner mind arise from the learner mind.

original: mi slob pa las ni lnga ste /
analyzed: mi slob pa las ni lnga ste /
translated: Five arise from the nonlearner.

original: slob pa'i gcig pu ma gtogs pa slob pa'i mjug thogs su lnga po ji lta ba bzhin no//
analyzed: slob pa'i gcig pu ma gtogs pa slob pa'i mjug thogs su lnga po ji lta ba bzhin no//
translated: Five arise from the nonlearner mind, just as they do from the learner mind, except for the learner mind alone.

original: de yang de gnyis las /
analyzed: de yang de gnyis las /
translated: Two arise from that.

original: mi slob pa ni lnga kho na las te /
analyzed: mi slob pa ni lnga kho na las te /
translated: Five arise from the nonlearner mind.

original: sbyor ba las byung ba gsum dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa dag las so //
analyzed: sbyor ba las byung ba gsum dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa dag las so //
translated: Three arisen from application, the learner mind and the nonlearner mind arise from the nonlearner mind.

original: ci'i phyir sbyor ba las byung ba'i sems kyi mjug thogs su ni rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dang / spyod lam pa dang / bzo'i gnas pa'i sems dag @125b 'byung la /
analyzed: ci'i phyir sbyor ba las byung ba'i sems kyi mjug thogs su ni rnam par smin pa las skyes pa dang / spyod lam pa dang / bzo'i gnas pa'i sems dag @125b 'byung la /
translated: Why do the mind governing demeanor and the mind governing creativity arise from the mind governing creativity and not from other minds?üîΩ

original: sbyor ba las byung ba ni de dag las ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: sbyor ba las byung ba ni de dag las ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why does a mind derived from karmic maturation arise from a mind of emanation, and why do the minds of demeanor and creativity arise from a mind of emanation, but a mind of emanation does not arise from them?

original: mngon par 'du byed zhugs pa'i phyir //
analyzed: mngon par 'du byed zhugs pa'i phyir //
translated: Because it is engaged through strong motivation.

original: stobs chung phyir dang 'bad med phyir //
analyzed: stobs chung phyir dang 'bad med phyir //
translated: Because it is weak and effortless.

original: sbyor ba las byung rjes mthun min //
analyzed: sbyor ba las byung rjes mthun min //
translated: A mind of emanation is not compatible with those.

original: de'i phyir de yi mjug thogs min //
analyzed: de'i phyir de yi mjug thogs min //
translated: Therefore it does not arise from them.

original: de la gsum ste /
analyzed: de la gsum ste /
translated: There are three reasons.

original: 'byung ba'i sems kyang mngon par 'du bya ba med pas sbyor ba las byung ba'i mjug thogs su dngos po'i don du rab tu skye'o //
analyzed: 'byung ba'i sems kyang mngon par 'du bya ba med pas sbyor ba las byung ba'i mjug thogs su dngos po'i don du rab tu skye'o //
translated: A mind of emanation arises from a mind of emanation and a mind of creation, because it is engaged through strong motivation.

original: de lta na 'o na ni nyon mongs pa can dag las kyang sbyor ba las byung ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta na 'o na ni nyon mongs pa can dag las kyang sbyor ba las byung ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: If that is so, then a mind of emanation would not arise from afflicted minds,

original: mi mthun pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are incompatible.

original: nyon mongs can las mi mthun kyang //
analyzed: nyon mongs can las mi mthun kyang //
translated: Even though it is incompatible with afflicted states,

original: nyon mongs kun 'byung yongs shes phyir//
analyzed: nyon mongs kun 'byung yongs shes phyir//
translated: it arises from afflicted states because it is the antidote of the origin of suffering.

original: sbyor ba las byung kun du 'byung //
analyzed: sbyor ba las byung kun du 'byung //
translated: Arisen from preparation, and universal.

original: mngon par sbyor ba la rigs so //
analyzed: mngon par sbyor ba la rigs so //
translated: It arises from application.

original: de la yang /üîΩslob dang mi slob sbyor byung dang // gzugs gtogs las ni 'dod spyod pa //
analyzed: de la yang / slob dang mi slob sbyor byung dang // gzugs gtogs las ni 'dod spyod pa //
translated: And in that,üîΩObtained from training and not training, and from form.

original: de las de ni 'bad med min //
analyzed: de las de ni 'bad med min //
translated: From desire realm conduct, it is not effortless.

original: gzugs med spyod pa'i nyon mongs las //
analyzed: gzugs med spyod pa'i nyon mongs las //
translated: From formless realm afflictions,

original: gzugs spyod skyes nas thob mi 'gyur //
analyzed: gzugs spyod skyes nas thob mi 'gyur //
translated: Form realm conduct is not obtained from birth.

original: gzugs spyod nyon mongs can las ni //
analyzed: gzugs spyod nyon mongs can las ni //
translated: From form realm afflictions,

original: 'dod gtogs mi gsal gsal phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod gtogs mi gsal gsal phyir ro //
translated: Desire realm conduct is not clear.

original: tshig le'ur byas pa 'di dag kyang 'grel pa kho na bsdus pa yin pas rnam par phye'o //
analyzed: tshig le'ur byas pa 'di dag kyang 'grel pa kho na bsdus pa yin pas rnam par phye'o //
translated: Since these verses are also a summary of the commentary, they are distinguished.

original: gang dag sems bcu gnyis bshad pa de dag las /
analyzed: gang dag sems bcu gnyis bshad pa de dag las /
translated: From among the twelve minds explained,

original: sems gang la du zhig rnyed ce na /üîΩkhams gsum pa yi nyon mongs can //
analyzed: sems gang la du zhig rnyed ce na / khams gsum pa yi nyon mongs can //
translated: how many minds are obtained in each?

original: drug dang drug dang gnyis rnyed do //
analyzed: drug dang drug dang gnyis rnyed do //
translated: Six, six, and two are obtainedüîΩin the afflicted of the three realms.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can gyi sems mngon du gyur na sems drug rnyed do /
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can gyi sems mngon du gyur na sems drug rnyed do /
translated: When the afflicted mind of the desire realm is manifest, six minds are obtained.

original: the tshom gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba'i nying mtshams sbyor ba dang / khams su slar ldog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: the tshom gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba'i nying mtshams sbyor ba dang / khams su slar ldog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because doubt interrupts the connection with the root of virtue and because it causes one to return to the realm.

original: khams su slar ldog pa dang / dngos su nyams pa las mi dge ba dang / bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dang / yongs su nyams na gzugs med na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dang /
analyzed: khams su slar ldog pa dang / dngos su nyams pa las mi dge ba dang / bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dang / yongs su nyams na gzugs med na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can dang /
translated: When one returns to the realm, one obtains six nonvirtuous and obscured neutral minds and afflicted minds operating in the form realm and when one degenerates, one obtains an afflicted mind operating in the formless realm.

original: slob pa'o // gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can la yang drug rnyed de /
analyzed: slob pa'o // gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can la yang drug rnyed de /
translated: When one obtains an afflicted mind operating in the form realm, one obtains six.

original: khams su slar ldog pa las gzugs na spyod pa gsum dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang / yongs su nyams pa las gzugs med pa'i nyon mongs pa can dang / slob pa'o //
analyzed: khams su slar ldog pa las gzugs na spyod pa gsum dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang / yongs su nyams pa las gzugs med pa'i nyon mongs pa can dang / slob pa'o //
translated: When one returns to the realm, one obtains three minds operating in the form realm, an unobscured neutral mind operating in the desire realm, an afflicted mind operating in the formless realm when one degenerates and a learner mind.

original: gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can la ni gnyis rnyed de /
analyzed: gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa can la ni gnyis rnyed de /
translated: When one obtains an afflicted mind operating in the formless realm, one obtains two.

original: yongs su nyams pa las nyon mongs pa can de nyid dang / slob pa'o //üîΩgzugs skyes dge @126a * //
analyzed: yongs su nyams pa las nyon mongs pa can de nyid dang / slob pa'o // gzugs skyes dge @126a * //
translated: The afflicted mind of the realm of desire is obtained in two ways, through retrogressing from the fruit of arhatship and through being born in the realm of desire.üîΩThe wholesome mind of the realm of desire is obtained in three ways, through retrogressing from the fruit of arhatship, from the fruit of non-returning, from the fruit of oncereturning; through being born in the realm of desire.üîΩThe unobscured-non-defined mind of the realm of desire is obtained in two ways, through retrogressing from the fruit of arhatship and from the fruit of non-returning.

original: la gsum dag go //
analyzed: la gsum dag go //
translated: The wholesome mind of the realm of fine-materiality is obtained in three ways, through retrogressing from the fruit of arhatship, from the fruit of non-returning, from the fruit of oncereturning; through being born in the realm of fine-materiality.üîΩThe unobscured-non-defined mind of the realm of fine-materiality is obtained in two ways, through retrogressing from the fruit of arhatship and from the fruit of non-returning.üîΩThe wholesome mind of the realm of immateriality is obtained in one way, through retrogressing from the fruit of arhatship.

original: dge ba de nyid dang / 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag go //üîΩslob pa la bzhi /
analyzed: dge ba de nyid dang / 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag go // slob pa la bzhi /
translated: The unobscured-non-defined mind of the realm of immateriality is obtained in two ways, through retrogressing from the fruit of arhatship and from the fruit of non-returning.üîΩThe learner‚Äôs mind is obtained in four ways, through retrogressing from the fruit of arhatship, from the fruit of non-returning, from the fruit of oncereturning; through being born in the realm of fine-materiality.

original: slob pa de nyid dang / 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag dang / gzugs med pa'i dge ba'o //
analyzed: slob pa de nyid dang / 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dag dang / gzugs med pa'i dge ba'o //
translated: The unobscured-non-defined mind of the realm of fine-materiality is obtained in two ways, through retrogressing from the fruit of arhatship and from the fruit of non-returning.

original: 'phags pa'i lam gyis 'dod pa dang gzugs kyi khams las 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa na'o //üîΩlhag la de /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam gyis 'dod pa dang gzugs kyi khams las 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa na'o // lhag la de /
translated: The wholesome mind of the realm of immateriality is obtained in one way, through retrogressing from the fruit of arhatship.

original: sems gang la rnyed pa ma bshad pa de la ni de nyid rnyed par blta bar bya'o //üîΩbsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa ni /
analyzed: sems gang la rnyed pa ma bshad pa de la ni de nyid rnyed par blta bar bya'o // bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa ni /
translated: The unobscured-non-defined mind of the realm of immateriality is obtained in two ways, through retrogressing from the fruit of arhatship and from the fruit of non-returning.

original: skye dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang ; /'dod chags bral dang yongs nyams dang // dge ba'i nying mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe //
analyzed: skye dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang ; /'dod chags bral dang yongs nyams dang // dge ba'i nying mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe //
translated: The unobscured-non-defined mind of the realm of immateriality is obtained in two ways, through retrogressing from the fruit of arhatship and from the fruit of non-returning.

original: sems de ldan pa min las rnyed //
analyzed: sems de ldan pa min las rnyed //
translated: It is obtained from a non-analytical mind.

original: ces bya'o // dbang po bstan pa zhes bya ba mdzod kyi gnas gnyis pa'o /
analyzed: ces bya'o // dbang po bstan pa zhes bya ba mdzod kyi gnas gnyis pa'o /
translated: This is the second chapter, called ‚ÄúThe Faculties.‚Äù

original: // / khams gsum gyi dbye bas sems la sogs pa rnams kyi dbye ba bshad nas /
analyzed: // / khams gsum gyi dbye bas sems la sogs pa rnams kyi dbye ba bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the classifications of minds and so on in terms of the three realms,

original: de nyid ma bshad pas de brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid ma bshad pas de brjod par bya ste /
translated: now the three realms themselves will be explained.üîΩThe desire realm consists of the hells,

original: dmyal ba yi dags dud 'gro dang // mi rnams dang ni lha drug dag /'dod pa'i khams yin /
analyzed: dmyal ba yi dags dud 'gro dang // mi rnams dang ni lha drug dag /'dod pa'i khams yin /
translated: hungry ghosts, animals, humans, and six types of gods.

original: 'gro ba bzhi dang / lha'i ris drug po 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'gro ba bzhi dang / lha'i ris drug po 'di lta ste /
translated: The four types of migrators and the six types of gods are as follows:

original: rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams te /
analyzed: rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams te /
translated: the Caturmaharajakas, the Trayastrimsas, the Yamas, the Tushitas, the NirmƒÅ·πáaratis, and the Paranirmitava≈õavartins.

original: 'di rnams ni 'dod pa'i khams yin no //
analyzed: 'di rnams ni 'dod pa'i khams yin no //
translated: These are the desire realm.üîΩThe desire realm has twenty,

original: dmyal ba dang / gling dbye ba las de nyi shu //
analyzed: dmyal ba dang / gling dbye ba las de nyi shu //
translated: due to the divisions of hells and continents.

original: gnas rnams zhes bya ba tshig lhag ma'o //
analyzed: gnas rnams zhes bya ba tshig lhag ma'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúabodes‚Äù is a remainder from the above.

original: dmyal ba chen po brgyad de /
analyzed: dmyal ba chen po brgyad de /
translated: There are eight great hells.

original: yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bsdus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / gling bzhi dang / yi dags dang / dud 'gro zhes bya ba gnas nyi shu po 'di dag 'dod pa'i khams so //üîΩ'dod pa'i khams 'di'i gong ma'i gnas dag bcu bdun ni /
analyzed: yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bsdus 'joms dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / gling bzhi dang / yi dags dang / dud 'gro zhes bya ba gnas nyi shu po 'di dag 'dod pa'i khams so // 'dod pa'i khams 'di'i gong ma'i gnas dag bcu bdun ni /
translated: The twenty abodes of sentient beings are the hells of Reviving, Black Line, Compression, Screaming, Great Screaming, Heat, Intense Heat, and Ultimate Torment; the four continents; and ghosts and animals.

original: gzugs khams yin /
analyzed: gzugs khams yin /
translated: The seventeen higher abodes above the desire realm are the form realm.

original: ji ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar yin zhe na /
translated: How are they so?

original: der so so yi /
analyzed: der so so yi /
translated: The individual

original: bsam gtan sa ni gsum pa yin //
analyzed: bsam gtan sa ni gsum pa yin //
translated: meditative absorptions are the third level.

original: bzhi pas ni brgyad pa yin //
analyzed: bzhi pas ni brgyad pa yin //
translated: The fourth level is the eighth.

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Thus it is said.üîΩThe first absorption has three levels:üîΩBrahma's Group,üîΩBrahma's Ministers, and

original: de la bsam @126b gtan dang po na ni tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams dang / tshangs chen rnams so //
analyzed: de la bsam @126b gtan dang po na ni tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams dang / tshangs chen rnams so //
translated: Great Brahma.üîΩThe second absorption has three levels:üîΩLesser,

original: gnyis pa na ni 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams so //
analyzed: gnyis pa na ni 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams so //
translated: Immeasurable Radiance, andüîΩGreat Radiance.

original: gsum pa na ni dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams so //
analyzed: gsum pa na ni dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams so //
translated: On the third level, there are the Parƒ´ttƒÅbha, ApramƒÅ·πáƒÅbha, and ƒÄbhƒÅsvara gods.

original: bzhi pa na ni sprin med 'od rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min rnams zhes bya ba gnas bcu bdun po 'di dag ni gzugs kyi khams so //
analyzed: bzhi pa na ni sprin med 'od rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin tu mthong rnams dang / 'og min rnams zhes bya ba gnas bcu bdun po 'di dag ni gzugs kyi khams so //
translated: On the fourth level, there are the gods of the Subhak·πõtsna, B·πõhatphala, Av·πõha, Atapa, Sudar≈õana, Sud·πõ≈õa, and Akani·π£·π≠ha realms. These seventeen are the form realm.

original: gzugs med khams na gnas med do //
analyzed: gzugs med khams na gnas med do //
translated: There are no abodes in the formless realm.

original: skye ba las ni rnam pa bzhi //
analyzed: skye ba las ni rnam pa bzhi //
translated: There are four types of birth.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched do //üîΩder ni ris dang srog la yang //
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched do // der ni ris dang srog la yang //
translated: the sphere of infinite space, the sphere of infinite consciousness, the sphere of nothingness, and the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception.üîΩIn those realms, the continuum of the mind

original: sems kyi rgyud ni rten yin /
analyzed: sems kyi rgyud ni rten yin /
translated: is the support for the class and life.
